descriptionHtml: first of all i would like to say this was made by torvus batch creator which can be found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54194/? this is simply a mod to godify any player instantly. IT IS HIGHLY RECOMENDED THAT YOU START A NEW GAME! if you have already finished skyrim you can disenchant and put unneeded items in chests (but it will take a long time!) please endorse this toook me 3 days! EDIT for those who dont understand this is a batch file(i will teach you how to install at the end) it gives you 99% of the items in the game (includes tgm command) and makes you impossible to kill. have fun! INSTALLATION just download the rar open it and put the text in you skyrim directory, go in game hit this ` and type bat TheDovahkiin. have fun!
author: Daniel the batch king
